basisSet.dc:title: aug-cc-pwCVDZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: DZP Double Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Augmented Correlation Consistent Polarized Weighted Core/Valence Double Zeta (aug-cc-pwCVDZ) Basis -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References H : (5s,2p) -> [3s,2p] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). He : (5s,2p) -> [3s,2p] D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 100, 2975 (1994). B - Ne: (11s,6p,2d) -> [5s,4p,2d] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J.C.P. 90, 1007 (1989). Al - Ar: (14s,10p,3d)-> [6s,5p,3d] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 117, 10548 (2002).
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation. The weighted core/valence basis sets weight the KL intershell correlation energy at the expense of the KK correlation.
Diffuse functions are taken from: R.A. Kendall, T.H. Dunning, Jr. and R.J. Harrison, J. Chem. Phys. 96, 6769 (1992) and D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 98, 1358 (1993).
